channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @tompeyer Didn’t your mom teach you to carry an umbrella? Oh. Right. Sorry.
Reupping this for the daytime crowd. https://t.co/z4PATQxSOs
@DBashIdeas The one where his clone carries on his mission to redeem the world. https://t.co/T1zC0Gx6h4
@Yoga4diabetes I’ve seen him sharing some of my political posts recently. Which means I need to do more of them.
@AdneSadeh It’s really cool because Workers Circle has a fancy section with gedolim like Lucy Davidowicz across from the Teaneck shul’s plot.

Thinking about off ramps for my Beloved Conservative Relative.
I suspect that his granddaughters are not too happy about Dobbs — even those who are still Orthodox.
His has always been more anti-Libs and just asking questions and “I hear Soros is paying antifa to burn down America״ than hardcore theocracy.
(He used to drive to the Reform Torah study group to berate the Libs, then drive to the Orthodox shul where his wife had walked to daven and then walk home with her.)
So how to confront him with the Christofascism and the couping and the blatant right wing lies and get him to say: You’re right. For the Second Civil War, I’m going to fight on the side of my granddaughters?
@AdneSadeh Offended by the Teaneck/ Cedar Park, Paramus erasure.
